name: Jackpot Spin Casino
description:
Try your lucky today, play the BEST slot machines with bonus games and free spins, Jackpot Spin Casino - Casino Games!

Play our Vegas-style slot machines with bonuses hourly and daily. Enjoy great slot machines, each with their own bonus mini games. Gain experience and level up and don't forget to climb up the leaderboards! Feel the thrill of real Las Vegas slots and mini games as you spin to win treasures and coins!

Features:
1. Jackpot Spin wheel for every slot machine.
2. Exciting multiplier mini casino games to win more.
3. Large jackpot and hourly rewards in slot games.
4. HD graphics and sounds, real Vegas slots style.
5. Slot machine games work without wifi - works perfect even without network, offline
6. Competitive Global Leaderboards
7. New slots added monthly



*THIS GAME IS ABSOLUTELY FREE. NO REAL WORLD MONEY IS INVOLVED.*
This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
